text: Free Studio is a free set of multimedia programs created by DVDVideoSoft. The software is combination of multiple programs of different use combined in one. You can download them as one in a package or separately.“All-terrain format converter”, by Niamh Lynch, December 18, 2009. Free Studio consists of 48 programs, grouped into eight sections: YouTube to MP3 converter,http://www.flvto.com/ YouTube to MP3 converter Audio, CD-DVD-BD, DVD & Video, Photo & Images, Mobiles, Apple Devices, 3D. Free YouTube to MP3 Converter is one of the five most popular software applications according to Chip Magazine.Chip Magazine Top 100 Chart. ==References== Category:Free software
title: Free Studio
